tasks.title: Respond to new ANGI leads immediately
tasks.description: Speed is critical - contact customers ASAP, gather requirements, schedule on-site visit

tasks.title: Monitor ANGI lead inbox
tasks.description: Check jarvisdimuro@gmail.com for new lead notifications

tasks.title: App Store review status
tasks.description: Inspectable app pending Apple review - monitor for approval

tasks.title: Plan Google Play submission
tasks.description: Prepare for Android launch once iOS is approved

tasks.title: Set up project management automation
tasks.description: Integrate Jarvis PM with other workflows

tasks.title: Set up ANGI lead notification monitoring
tasks.description: Build automated monitoring of jarvisdimuro@gmail.com for ANGI lead notifications. Alert immediately when new leads come in so we can respond fast.

tasks.title: Create lead response templates
tasks.description: Draft professional response templates for different lead types (roofing, kitchen, bathroom, etc.) to speed up initial outreach.

tasks.title: Add Google Analytics to Synergy site
tasks.description: Install GA4 tracking to understand visitor behavior, traffic sources, and conversion rates.

tasks.title: Add contact form backend
tasks.description: The Synergy site needs a working contact form. Set up serverless form handling (Netlify Forms, Formspree, or custom).

tasks.title: Prepare Google Play Store listing
tasks.description: Create app store listing assets for Android: screenshots, feature graphic, description, keywords. Be ready to submit once iOS is approved.

tasks.title: Add TypeScript to Inspectable backend
tasks.description: Migrate inspectable-backend from JavaScript to TypeScript for better type safety and maintainability.

tasks.title: Add test coverage to Inspectable
tasks.description: Set up Jest/Vitest and add unit tests for critical paths (auth, AI analysis, PDF generation).

tasks.title: Optimize PDF generation
tasks.description: Puppeteer is heavy - explore lighter alternatives like react-pdf or pdfkit for faster report generation.

tasks.title: Consolidate Patient Portal state management
tasks.description: Patient Portal uses both Redux and Zustand. Migrate everything to Zustand for consistency with other portals.

tasks.title: Extract shared component library
tasks.description: Capture Health portals share many UI components. Extract into a shared package to reduce duplication and ensure consistency.

tasks.title: Add E2E tests for critical flows
tasks.description: Set up Playwright or Cypress and add E2E tests for: patient intake, payment processing, order management.

tasks.title: Add structured logging to API
tasks.description: Implement Winston or Pino for structured logging in capture-api. Better debugging and monitoring in production.

tasks.title: Implement RevenueCat subscription system
tasks.description: Full-stack subscription implementation: Frontend (RevenueCat SDK, paywall UI, gating) + Backend (webhooks, middleware, schema). PRs: frontend#1, backend#1
